website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a refreshing, cooling eye gel pad, you've found it with an award-winning product from a luxury brand.
pros: These gel pads help firm and tone your delicate under-eye skin
Improves blood flow and helps reduce puffiness
Awarded "Best Travel Beauty Product of the Year" in 2014
cons: Some said the patches are too dry

customer_reviews.title: I was really excited to work on my terrible bags under my eyes
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to work on my terrible bags under my eyes. With a newborn in the house and some added stress in my life my eyes needed some love. I had a great experience putting them on but 3 minutes after I took them off the area the patches were on turned red! 😳
customer_reviews.author: brianna

customer_reviews.title: Great at first, then caused skin irritation
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product twice. The first set was awesome. It worked well and helped reduce the swelling/puffiness under my eyes when I used the product. But, the second set that I bought made my skin irritated. I have used three pairs of the eye gels from the second set, and each time my skin becomes red, splotchy, and irritated. It feels fine when the gel is on, but once I take it off the skin becomes inflamed and uncomfortable. I really wanted to be able to use this product a lot more, but its just not worth the skin irritation. I have sensitive skin, so maybe its just a problem for people with skin like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product gives visible results and is more affordable than a similar product I’ve tried. The eye gels are easy to apply and stay put until you take them off. You can see the difference in my before & after photos, and this was after wearing the eye gels for about 10 minutes. When I wear them longer, the results are even better. After 10 minutes, the dark circles were eliminated, puffiness was almost gone, and lines were greatly reduced. Definitely a good product and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Love these.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical but ordered them to try anyway, because I hate the lines under my eyes and my dark circles. These are awesome! After trying them once I have already ordered more because they really worked. They didn’t magically mask every single issue, but they definitely improved it. On my picture- the left one you can see the wrinkle under my eye. After I used the gels, I took another picture, and the wrinkle is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Expired Product
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy the 8 pack but this time I decided to buy two 4 packs since they were cheaper. However, it seems the reason that they're cheaper is because they've been expired for several months.
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: I should have listened to the mediocre reviews. New I was taking a chance. Not worth it. At all.
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the mediocre reviews, but i wanted to try them out. I used them at normal temp as well as after being kept in the fridge. Unfortunately, they really didn’t do anything at all. :( I’m convinced that the “glowing” reviews are either sponsored people or people from the company who were given $ to purchase (so it shows as verified purchase) My skin is quiet sensitive and reacts to even the faintest solutions. With this product there was zero change. Definitely not a good quick fix.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora

customer_reviews.title: The best eye gel patches ever!! So refreshing!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these things!! I can never get enough! They feel luxurious under my eyes during my "Spa nights" each week! I keep mine in the fridge so they are nice and cool, more effective this way too! I definitely recommend these for those who are trying to combat dark circles and puffiness under the eye. I just wish they werent quite so expensive.. 4 for $15 is almost $4 a pair. Should be more like $2-3 per pair.
customer_reviews.author: Sean and Tara

customer_reviews.title: They also have a very cooling sensation that wakes you up and they are very comfortable on. They won't move and they stay in ...
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised at the results after using this the second time. The first time I only used it for 10 minutes as it says, and didn't notice much of a difference, but the second time I left it on for 20-25 minutes and saw results. My skin looked more plump and hydrated! They also have a very cooling sensation that wakes you up and they are very comfortable on. They won't move and they stay in place. The packaging was fine, although some of the patches fell out of their cartridge due to them being shipped. They still work great and I recommend. They definitely de-puff and restore your face.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: No gel, pure stick
customer_reviews.text: Felt like I was using a post it note under my eye. Although they were cooling, when you go to take them off, they pull your very fragile undereye skin. If you don't believe me, try filming it in slo-mo, even young skin gets stretched. Saw no difference in puffiness either. I don't have dark circles, so no comment on that. Going back to Wander.
customer_reviews.author: bluebox

customer_reviews.title: My favorite part of my beauty regimen
customer_reviews.text: The skyn ICELAND eye gels have been a godsend. I sampled them in a beauty box a couple years ago and couldn't find them anywhere locally. One night I was putting on Amazon and they appeared. BAM - in the cart you go. The eye gels are cooling when applied, and moisturizing to the delicate eye area - my skin looks stunning and refreshed after each use. They're a little pricey but the results can't be replicated by any other product. Splurge and enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE: (NOT THE) Best eye pads!
customer_reviews.text: Update: Too expensive now! I started using these when they were 26.00 and they aren't as good. Somethings changed and they are a lot dryer now. These are by far my favorite eye pads. They work! They moisturize my under eyes very well and help diminish puffiness and fine lines. I like to use them in the morning before makeup application. They stay on and do not slip around. I also use them with my LED face mask so I don't get indent marks around my eyes. These are my must haves for travel as well.
customer_reviews.author: sharwill

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as an indulgence for an upcoming flight for a vacation. Airplanes leave my skin dry and lackluster- hoping these will perk me up a bit. I used the pads as directed for 10 minutes at home. I noticed an improvement in texture and color of the skin beneath my eyes. The skin tightened and was a little younger and less translucent looking. They were comfortable to have on and refreshingly cool and moisturizing. These fall in the category of “nice to have”. They won’t be an essential of my routine, but I will buy them again for occasional use. I do not normally use eye creams or similar products, but am experimenting more as I age.
customer_reviews.author: Alana M. Deranek

customer_reviews.title: My favorite go to under eye patches!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used these for the last couple of years and continue to rebuy them. Perfect to apply while getting ready and give your under eyes a lift. I prefer just the under eye package but have used the forehead and patches around my mouth. PRO TIP: put these on while traveling on long plane rides especially if you need to look good when you land or the next day. Lastly, these are awesome for gifts. I gave my MIL and SIL one year with Xmas gifts and now they have become a reoccurring gift we give each other.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay K

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it, don’t “subscribe and save”
customer_reviews.text: Felt nice and cooling, but I really didn’t see much difference on my exhausted eyes. I have little eye pads that I keep in the fridge... from Dollar Tree that are more effective. Or remember when your favorite aunt told you about cold spoons?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spa day at home
customer_reviews.text: I really like these! Definitely a cooling eye pad, felt nice and relaxing. I wore them for 15 minutes while folding laundry. It like a mini trip to the spa at home. I can’t wait to order more of the skyn Iceland products!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Crabb

customer_reviews.title: I love these patches
customer_reviews.text: I love these patches! They feel so good and cool on my eyes! I put them on then take a rest on the couch. When I take them off, my eyes are clearly less puffy and the skin is so smooth. I will definitely be buying more of these!
customer_reviews.author: Desert Rose

customer_reviews.title: These really help with my puffy under eyes!
customer_reviews.text: A friend gave me some of these and I have been ordering ever since. I throw these on first thing in the morning while I drink my coffee or for a long relax on the couch on Saturday. My eyes look less puffy and it’s so soothing. I think they help me with headaches but that’s not proven.
customer_reviews.author: Allison V

customer_reviews.title: The 10 minute time is really convenient and works better than any 30 minute ones I've tried
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 21 year old with very oily/sensitive skin. However, I smile a lot so I've begun aging on the driest part of my face-under my eyes. After using these pads after numerous cremes I can really say that these ARE worth it over other products. The 10 minute time is really convenient and works better than any 30 minute ones I've tried. Will keep investing in these.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Dude

customer_reviews.title: expired
customer_reviews.text: unfortunately, though i love this brand, i dont think buying through amazon is wise. My patches were pruchased in May and at the beginning of August i opened a patch set and they were expired, you cant tell until you open them so I didnt notice that the set of 8 were expired. I just went to use another pair and the smell/color it was very obvious that they too were expired.
customer_reviews.author: Jesenia

customer_reviews.title: Helps reduce the appearance of eye bags
customer_reviews.text: The eye gels are now a staple in my medicine cabinet. What I like most about the eye gels is they help reduce the appearance of “bags” under the eyes. If I have an important event I will use the morning of and leave on for at least twenty minutes. I would highly recommend this product. 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Bilzor

customer_reviews.title: A must-have item when traveling! Work great and fast too.
customer_reviews.text: A friend gave me a pack to try when I was visiting her and I have purchased more several times since then. Because they are adhesive, you can easily put them on in the morning and continue getting ready for the day. They have a lovely cooling sensation and oh my goodness have they gotten rid of some puffy eyes on me before! They peel off easily without hurting and really help make you look more awake. Just be careful not to put them too high up next to your eyelids because it will feel uncomfortable blinking while they work.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Cooling
customer_reviews.text: love these eye gels! After a late night or a restless night sleep, these eye gels really helped reduce puffy eyes and make you feel rejuvenated. Gave a couple to a friend to try and she loved them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these but wish they were more affordable
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I wish they were more affordable as I'd buy them more often. That said I am a repeat buyer but I save them for special occasions rather than always using them when I'd like to. I've also purchased the "face lift" set for part of a gift and my mom also loved that. They're cool, refreshing and you really can see an immediate difference after the suggested time to keep them on. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Heather Diggs

customer_reviews.title: dried out
customer_reviews.text: these have a cooling effect and stay on your eyes as you move about your morning, but are completely dried out. zero product and did not see any results. stick with shiseido eye masks. nothing competes.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: My all time favorite eye gels
customer_reviews.text: This are nice to use in the morning, but when you need a little pick me up. They are cooling to the skin, and leave my under eye area a little lighter and smooth. They stick on pretty good and don't move around -- so they're great for multi-tasking! :-)
customer_reviews.author: EVGreen

customer_reviews.title: Not ok for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: The company says these are okay to use on sensitive skin, but I had a reaction. My skin got red and inflamed in the outline of the eye patch. I contacted Skyn Iceland and they said they would look into the lot number. They offered me a different batch but I don’t want to take my chances. I used these a long time ago and didn’t have a reaction so I’m wondering if they changed the formula.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only a slight difference.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful packaging and they feel nice to wear but only make a tiny bit of difference. I took before and after pics to see the difference and it’s only slight. Especially considering the cost- I think a spoon from the freezer might work about the same.
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: 💙 REFRESHING COOLING EFFECT 💓like that they contain peptides & antioxidants
customer_reviews.text: These feel SO refreshing...The patch delivers a cooling sensation on contact....they do soothe the undereye skin & I feel they reduce the appearance of tired eyes. I like that they contain peptides, and antioxidants...I enjoyed using these very much 😊
customer_reviews.author: Shann 🎀 Shann

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Just got this product the other day. Tried it out on my puffy eyes... and it did nothing. Absolutely no change whatsoever. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Chris F

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with my skin
customer_reviews.text: Everytime I used this product, little pink bumps would pop up underneath my eyes. I tried a couple of times, but then ended up giving the rest of the product away to a friend, haven't yet heard how they worked for her, but unfortunately, my skin didnt react well to this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gennie Stringfellow

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money! Barely do ANYTHING
customer_reviews.text: These are very expensive for what they are and are barely effective. * Barely cool on contact - even after I stored in the fridge * Do not leave residual moisture or depuff the eye area * Adhesive to keep the product in place is quite strong and is not great on delicate under eye area I would think twice before purchasing - individual packaging is great but not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Laura J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Confused on How to Use, but I Love the Eye Patches!
customer_reviews.text: I love love these eye patches!! I’m just completely confused on what or how I’m supposed to use the gel drops?? No instructions that fully explain how to use them. Wouldn’t make sense to put the gel on before the patches- how would they stick on?
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Buy them
customer_reviews.text: These are great expensive for just a few but they are good. I use them when I’m traveling for business and I need a fresh face in the am. They stick which is great you can do other things while you have these on.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: really works
customer_reviews.text: I keep these in the frig to help with the puffiness. I think they do help with my puffy bags.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Gilberti

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Dakota Johnson once said that she liked these patches in an Allure interview so I decided to give it a try! It can reduce the puffiness in a few minutes and moisturize the skin under eyes! I also feel my eyes are somehow brightened after then. Totally worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: xxxxx

customer_reviews.title: Truly amazing! I usually get puffy eyes after eating salty
customer_reviews.text: Truly amazing! I usually get puffy eyes after eating salty, or just plain crying. Love this product, my eyes puffiness goes down in minutes, and I realize my undereye concealer seems to look better after using this!
customer_reviews.author: Burcu

customer_reviews.title: Expired product?
customer_reviews.text: I have been using those for a long time, now that we moved overseas and I finally got my order, once I opened them they stink like gasoline and were yellowish, they kind of melt in my hands were super sticky and ended up in the trash, like if they were expired.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't work.
customer_reviews.text: They did not work for me. I saw 0 improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Sleepy,  tired eyes are WIDE AWAKE!
customer_reviews.text: Cooling and comfortable! Put pair in fridge and it was perfect for these tired eyes! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cisnes

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product for puffy post travel under eye area. Pop in the refrigerator for added benefits. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Stone

customer_reviews.title: Really works for me!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried few eye mask for my baggy eyes. So far this is the only product that seems to work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: They work great!
customer_reviews.text: My spouse uses these to get rid of puffiness and dark circles. The work great!
customer_reviews.author: JASON D.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Not a valuable enough product to justify the price. You can get these same type of products for 1/2 the costs from different sites or different brands.
customer_reviews.author: isaiah lehman

customer_reviews.title: A Great Facial Regimine Addition
customer_reviews.text: I like these and do believe they are effective and quick. I read other online reviews before purchasing and was slightly hesitant but was surprised at the results. I use these at night or after a disco nap before embarking on an epic all nighter. Also great to use if you plan just a night of relaxation. I recommend everyone with bags or dark circles under their eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: The eye gels may be stuck together and may not stick as well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these online here and most of my eye gels were stuck together and did not stick well on my face. I did not realize that the majority of them were like that until I open the package indiviually. I think I will order directly from the skyn's website like I use too.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try!
customer_reviews.text: They aren’t plastic surgery BUT they do feel amazing and totally reduce puffiness and fine lines. I love using them and feeling like I’m pampering myself!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Costello

customer_reviews.title: Love this! It really works
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It really works. under eye bags are diminished and even gone for a while! Yes I would recommend this to anyone who wants to look great!
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: These eye patches are great for giving you the extra boost you need before a date, presentation, or just staying in for the night. In just 15 minutes, your eyes are revitalized and all under eye puffiness is gone. My only issue is that they are a little expensive, otherwise I would use them 3 to 5 times a week! Love them, love them, love them!
customer_reviews.author: TetOffZG

customer_reviews.title: Great eye patched
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite eye patches. A little pricey but great product.
customer_reviews.author: Lacy Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Just meh...
customer_reviews.text: Meh. Didn’t love them... I was hoping too! But I feel they were kind of useless and dried out fast. They irritated my eyes? But maybe I had them up too high 🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best product
customer_reviews.text: Best product by far I have found to get rid of under eye bags. My go to whenever I need a little pick me up.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: This eye mask just cooling. Not good at remove dark circle. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Littletomato

customer_reviews.title: Tried 2X. Barely a change. Hard to read packaging and small print.
customer_reviews.text: eh. not working for me and I had great expectations. I hate small print on white on a light color. Who the heck thinks that is a good idea.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Great to reduce puffy undereye
customer_reviews.text: Great to reduce puffy undereye. If price is stiff then i still recommend as I use them for (an important day or event).
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I bring these every time I travel for work to put on in the morning. Very easy to use and provides cooling and moisture under your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Astrid Aekerley

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I love these under eye patches. These cold and hydrating patches feel wonderful after a long day or long night. I have tried a lot of different patches but some tend to break me out or not stay put. They are on the expensive side so I save them for a night that I want to treat myself. I would recommend giving them a try.
customer_reviews.author: ASG5R8

customer_reviews.title: must try
customer_reviews.text: I wish these were cheaper because I love using them so much - I've tried a bunch of these in varying brands and still come back to this one. It's just fresh and easy.
customer_reviews.author: MY

customer_reviews.title: I also like that one side of the patches are fuzzy
customer_reviews.text: A noticeable difference when I use these at night. I also like that one side of the patches are fuzzy. These are the best value for great results.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Jones

customer_reviews.title: FAV!
customer_reviews.text: Love these and love how they feel. I keep them in the frig and they are very soothing to use in the AM.
customer_reviews.author: Lacy Cooper

customer_reviews.title: These work. I wear them before any event to ...
customer_reviews.text: These work. I wear them before any event to make myself look more awake, and people notice immediately. I always get "are you wearing makeup?" questions after I've used these. Worth a try!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A Graham

customer_reviews.title: JUST THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: Best product ever! It's honestly the best for my under eyes. I can just place them under my eyes and continue with my morning routine. These are amazing, specially after a long night. I Def recommend purchasing them.
customer_reviews.author: Edison

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They definitely smooth and plump the under eye area. Don't leave them on past about 20 minutes- they will start to irritate.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: They were OK... they were cooling, but kept sliding off as well as being sticky and gooey, didn’t feel or see any difference in the eye area. Wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie L

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Instant cooling action, depuffs eye area. Great for rough mornings!
customer_reviews.author: New Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome for a tired morning! Definitely a must buy.
customer_reviews.author: HH19

customer_reviews.title: Most luxurious and highest quality eye patches I’ve bought on impulse.
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended for a spa-like eye treatment. These are very high quality. The nicest of the eye masks I’ve bought through Amazon ( an impulse buy that actually impressed me. Very Rare!)
customer_reviews.author: BVerité

customer_reviews.title: Good product for puffy under eyes
customer_reviews.text: I like that these eye patches are easy to use and aren’t slimey like some other brands. They are pricey but work well on my puffy eyes.
customer_reviews.author: LSH

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: These things feel good while they are cool but become room temperature in seconds. Certainly don't help with swollen eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Ann E

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I will be ordering a larger quantity soon. They help with my puffy bags under my eyes in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: It works pretty well, I didn't realize that it was just a quick fix item though. It is a good product to use right before an event.
customer_reviews.author: carina

customer_reviews.title: No results
customer_reviews.text: These did nothing for me. I expected some difference, but none.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect eye mask
customer_reviews.text: These eye masks are hands down the best ones I have tried. They feel great after being in the fridge, but its not necessary. They actually stay on and aren't messy. My eyes- and whole face feel refreshed after 20 minutes with these on.
customer_reviews.author: Cory2

customer_reviews.title: Cooling and Hydrating Eye Mask
customer_reviews.text: I love these eye patches and use regularly! They feel refreshing and they do help in rejuvenating tired/sleep deprived eyes. Pamper and enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Potselueff

customer_reviews.title: Seemed to work
customer_reviews.text: You can't expect some eye gels to work miracles, but these did temporarily seem to smooth over the under eye area.
customer_reviews.author: Joann

customer_reviews.title: Does what they advertise
customer_reviews.text: I bought these when Amazon was selling them for 50% off, which is an amazing deal! They are very easy to apply, are cooling and reduce eye puffiness. I highly reccomend this brand!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: skin Iceland firming eye patches
customer_reviews.text: These really help cool and relieve bags under the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: OK patches but not sure they work
customer_reviews.text: These patches are OK. I couldn't see any difference after using them. They are on the sticky side and the dry side. I will not buy them again
customer_reviews.author: The Belgianize

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! After a busy day or week, I use this product. It really refreshes the under eye area leaving my skin looking fresh and not as tired as I feel on the inside! I will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: kpro30

customer_reviews.title: OLD and DRIED OUT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these eye gels several times on Amazon and other places and have NEVER had them come un-opened, but still completely DRIED OUT!!! So disappointed, going on a trip and love the way they work for me!.
customer_reviews.author: Vera D.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive product, no results
customer_reviews.text: After trying a variety of products for puffy eyes, I was hopeful that this product would work. However, it did not work for me. I saw no difference after using this product. It was uncomfortable by the eyes. This is a super expensive product and does not deliver results.
customer_reviews.author: Tttt6666444

customer_reviews.title: Love these Eye Gels
customer_reviews.text: I think I've tried almost every wrinkle product out there. These eye gels are great for the price. They do seem to tingle and firm my undereyes a bit. No miracles, but I love these.
customer_reviews.author: carfeen1

customer_reviews.title: Easy, clean, quick
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I use them at least once a week. Easy to use and great for a quick lift
customer_reviews.author: Randy Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t remove my dark circles
customer_reviews.text: They didn’t remove my dark circles but I noticed that they removed the fine lines
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ninesteel

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I wore these when my eyes got swollen and puffy from pregnancy. They worked great!
customer_reviews.author: LGB

customer_reviews.title: A must have for puffy, tired eyes.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best Eye patches. They hide a multitude of sins and or a mainstay with my skin care. I find them even more soothing when I store them in the refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: Great for travel. I like the short amount of time that they need to work
customer_reviews.author: greenbird

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product feels very good on. Provides short term puff relief.
customer_reviews.author: TMS

customer_reviews.title: They actually work!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Works so much better than the very expensive masks I’ve tried and don’t slide around my face. One use depuffed and seemed to lighten-up the very dark circles under my eyes and minimize crows feet. Definitely buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Jaje715

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on me
customer_reviews.text: Pretty awesome...the rejuvenating-fast effect is quite impressive, bummer it's an expensive product, otherwise I would definitely use it regularly as a side treatment.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: this is the best product ever
customer_reviews.text: When you are having a hard time opening your eyes, this is the best product ever. I have bought them as gifts and everyone loves it. They are wonderful
customer_reviews.author: sheila k moore

customer_reviews.title: Didnt see a change felt good though
customer_reviews.text: I don't know I didn't see any difference or anything, but it did feel good when putting it on
customer_reviews.author: Amira A

customer_reviews.title: love!!!
customer_reviews.text: so cooling and comfortable!!! i love this brand for eye products!
customer_reviews.author: brittany s.

customer_reviews.title: Did absolutely nothing
customer_reviews.text: Complete waste of money, did absolutely nothing. After reading all the reviews I was excited to try this product. While it has a cooling effect on the eyes, it does not get rid of dark circles or puffiness. Would not recommend and will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle DeFrancesco

customer_reviews.title: Love these !
customer_reviews.text: All of skyn ICELAND products are the best . These work great for a quick fix the same day and give the best noticeable results over any other under eye patches !
customer_reviews.author: Holly Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product for a whi li e now, works great! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mila G

customer_reviews.title: Warning: Not the same as the product you buy directly from the store
customer_reviews.text: Either these were NOT the same as the product you order directly though the Skyn website or Ulta, or the ones I received were expired. They smelled bad and were yellowed. Very disappointing!!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Spotts

customer_reviews.title: Product is making my skin rash up!
customer_reviews.text: I left these on for maybe 30 minutes max and I now have a red rash where the eye mask was below my eye. Really wanted to like this product, but won’t be trying the remaining 7
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Did nothing for my undereyes. Followed the directions and never noticed a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Magical
customer_reviews.text: These are magical. They reduce puffiness and take years off my tired eyes.
customer_reviews.author: CuteCatLady

customer_reviews.title: Best eye pads out there
customer_reviews.text: My favorite eye pads by far, I have them on autoship. Cooling relief and no residue when removed
customer_reviews.author: Michele Linderborn

product_meta.title: skyn ICELAND Hydro Cool Firming Eye Gels, 8 Count
product_meta.description: Size:8 CountWhen you're run down and stressed out, the delicate skin under your eyes really takes a beating, resulting in puffiness and premature wrinkling. In just ten minutes, this cooling transdermal gel patch infuses the eye area with Icelandic glacial waters and concentrated doses of firming ingredients to de-puff, tone and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Peptides and botanicals improve blood flow and reduce puffiness while advanced antioxidants help prevent future damage. The patch, a cutting-edge delivery system, is easy to both apply and remove and is non-irritating. Hydrolyzed elastin helps restore tone and firmness to under-eye area Acetyl hex peptide helps reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles by calming muscles under the skin Ginkgo balboa leaf extract relaxes blood vessels to improve blood flow and help reduce puffiness Coenzyme Q10, a powerful antioxidant, fights free radicals which lead to premature .
feature_bullets: Hydrolyzed elastin helps restore tone and firmness to under-eye area
Acetyl hex peptide helps reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles by calming muscles under the skin
Ginkgo balboa leaf extract relaxes blood vessels to improve blood flow and help reduce puffiness
Coenzyme Q10, a powerful antioxidant, fights free radicals which lead to premature aging
